text: The helmeted worm lizard (Amphisbaena acangaoba) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== acangaoba Category:Reptiles described in 2020 Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Taxa named by Leonardo de Barros Ribeiro Category:Taxa named by Samuel Campos Gomides Category:Taxa named by Henrique Caldeira Costa
title: Amphisbaena acangaoba
